actions.text: On agreeing to the Griffin (AR) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to reduce funds for Salaries and Expenses of the Secretary of Transportation by $500,000 and to increase funds for operational expenses of the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration by $500,000.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Salaries and Expenses of the Secretary of Transportation by $500,000 and to increase funds for operational expenses of the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration by $500,000.
